parameters: Craft something at the stronger magic forge?
\n<Blacksmith>The magic forge is to your right.
My son can sell you some items.
\n<Blacksmith>Yes, the general told me you four would be coming.
\n<Blacksmith>What was this for again... tellurium equipment?
\n<Blacksmith>No, no, it certainly was... here, let me see your \ii[101].
\n<Blacksmith>Takes tellurium dust to make a tellurium pickaxe.
We haven't mined it in a while, but thankfully a small
amount was found during the re-documentation of the
castle storerooms. Perfect timing for you four.
\n<Blacksmith>Go to Bladesville. You know where the Abandoned
North Mine is? Now that you have this pickaxe, you
should unlock a new layer filled with tellurium.
\n<Blacksmith>Forge a \ii[176] and show me. Then I'll
consider you trained. Of course, I highly
encourage you to still craft at least one
\n<Blacksmith>The magic forge is to your right.

is technically done, but crafting a
set of tellurium weapons would help
